long_description: The Leki Wanderfreund antishock walking staff adds state-of-the-art stability to your explorations, whether trekking in Nepal or meandering around the neighborhood. Soft Antishock System offers a quiet ride with little rebound. Delivering ultimate holding force, the Leki Wanderfreund staff offers 300+ lbs. of locking force for aggressive use. Super Lock System adjustment requires minimal effort to securely lock pole sections into position. Strong, 3-section aluminum straight shaft is heat-treated for outstanding tensile strength. Collapses from 47.25 to 24.4 in. for easy packing. Rubber grip offers multiple hand positions, letting you use the Wanderfreund as a cane or a staff. Scratch-resistant surfaces and high polish lacquering protect your Leki Wanderfreund staff from abrasion. Leki Wanderfreund antishock staff features a durable rubber walking tip; remove the tip to expose a carbide tip for additional bite on tricky terrain.
short_description: The Leki Wanderfreund antishock walking staff adds state-of-the-art stability to your explorations, whether trekking in Nepal or meandering around the neighborhood.
